rooms.description: A welcoming entrance with integrated storage and coat area, adhering to Vastu for positive energy flow.
Spacious modern living room with floor-to-ceiling windows on the garden side, ensuring natural light and ventilation.
Adjacent to the kitchen, designed for family dining while maintaining an open layout in keeping with contemporary style.
Modern kitchen with efficient work triangle and ample storage, incorporating Vastu guidelines for placement of water sources and electrical outlets.
Convenience guest toilet adhering to local building norms and accessibility standards.
